meditations.title: Breathing Relaxation
meditations.description: Reduce your stress levels as you decompress from thoughts and ground yourself in the present moment.

meditations.title: Body Scan
meditations.description: Learn to distinguish how emotions reflect in your body by paying close attention to all sensations.

meditations.title: Stress Exploration
meditations.description: A deep exploration of difficult emotions and stress triggers. Manage stress by knowing what's causing it.

meditations.title: Quick Break
meditations.description: Release anxiety by taking this mindful journey to a place of happiness and tranquility.

meditations.title: Stillness Meditation
meditations.description: Re-train your mind to enjoy being still in this moment, and away from worries and recurring thoughts.

meditations.title: Mind Reset
meditations.description: Reset your mind through your breath, and get rid of recurring thoughts and anxiety emotions

meditations.title: Chocolate Meditation
meditations.description: Test your patience and your focus as your delight yourself eating a delicious chocolate.

meditations.title: Breathing Focus
meditations.description: Enhance your focus by directing your full attention to things you usually do in autopilot, such as breathing.

meditations.title: Morning Focus
meditations.description: Start your day fully calmed, focused and with greater purpose.

meditations.title: Creating Your Place
meditations.description: Spark your creativity and put your mind to work by visualy creating a nice and relaxing place

meditations.title: Alternative Thinking
meditations.description: Change your perspective and your patterns as you guide your mind to open up for new ideas and creations.

meditations.title: Cultivating Gratitud
meditations.description: Expand your gratitude and make it a habit, it will change your outlook and empower your relationships

meditations.title: Emotions Observation
meditations.description: Don't get overwhelmed by your emotions, instead learn to observe and respond constructively.

meditations.title: Forest Visualization
meditations.description: Change your thinking patterns with this visual, mindful walk through a beautiful forest.

meditations.title: Kindness for Oneself
meditations.description: Practice loving and appreciating yourself first, so then it can translate to all people in your life.

meditations.title: Ages: Under 6
meditations.description: These meditations are perfect for kid's under 6 since they are fun and interactive, but still making them feel calmer.

meditations.title: Ages: 7-9 Years Old
meditations.description: This category is ideal for older kids. They'll practice paying close attention to what's happening in the present moment, and expand their ability to focus.

meditations.title: Ages: 10-12 Years Old
meditations.description: These meditations are engaging but soothing. Perfect for kid's to practice awareness and calmness all at the same time.
